name: Too Many Zombies, Too Many Bullets
name_original: Too Many Zombies, Too Many Bullets
description:
Welcome to Too Many Zombies, Too Many Bullets!

Zombies are invading the world, and you must protect it. You have a gun and a sword. But the bullets bounce off the walls...

Made in 72h for the ScoreSpace Game Jam #17. Theme: PROTECT.

There is an offline leaderboard. It already has some of our scores so try to beat those :P

The leaderboard is only for map 1. Press "M" to change your map.

MOBILE:
